export default Courses

export const mainColorAlternate = '#333333'

name: src/containers/Courses.js
src/containers/Session.js
login
description: Login with the siding

name: src/redux/modules/user.js
src/redux/reducers.js
src/redux/store.js
src/utils/api.js
SIDING_ERROR_MESSAGES
description: Strings that appear on a siding login failed page

name: SIDING_AUTH_FAILED
description: Siding authentication failed error

name: formData
description: Transforms a json into a FormData object

return.description: A FormData with the json data

name: Api
description: A siding api client

name: request
description: Executes a siding request

params.name: url
params.description: The url to perform the request to

params.name: repeat
params.description: How many times the request has been tried

return.description: A promise that resolves with the response

name: auth
description: Authenticates the user with siding

return.description: A promise that resolves to true after auth is succesfull

name: src/utils/date.js
sidingSemester
description: Transforms a month into a siding semester

params.name: date
params.description: The date to obtain the month from

name: CURRENT_DATE
description: The user's current date

name: SIDING_YEAR
description: The current siding year

name: SIDING_SEMESTER
description: The current siding semester

name: src/utils/parser.js
parser
description: The DOMParser for parsing siding responses

name: parseCourses
description: Parse a courses' list page to read its courses

params.name: html
params.description: The full html of the main courses page

return.description: An array with course objects { id, acronym, name, section, folder: {} }

name: parseCourse
description: Parses a siding course's page to read it's folders

return.description: An array of siding courses { id, name }

name: src/utils/urls.js
BASE_URL
description: The siding base url

name: COURSES_URL
description: The siding courses' base url

name: LOGIN_URL
description: The siding login url

name: LOGOUT_URL
description: The siding logout url

name: coursesUrl
description: Returns the url with the courses list of the user for a period

params.name: semester
params.description: The semester: first 21, second 22 or tav 23

name: courseUrl
description: Returns the url for a specific course

name: coursesCatalogUrl
description: Returns the url for the courses' catalog for a period

params.name: semester
params.description: The semester: first 21, second 22 or tav 23

name: folderUrl
description: Returns the url for a course folders

name: CURRENT_COURSES_URL
description: The courses list url of the user for the current period

name: src/utils/wait.js
WAIT_SECONDS
description: The time, in seconds, to wait before retrying a siding request

name: wait
description: Waits the WAIT_SECONDS times the amount of repeats

return.description: A promise that resolves when the time is passed

content:
# Siding mobile client

[![circleciB]][circleciL]
[![docsB]][docsL]
[![commitsB]][commitsL]
[![standard-versionB]][standard-versionL]

A mobile client for iOS and android for accessing the UC's Siding. Powered by React-Native

## Beta testing

[Android](https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.siding)

<!-- Badges -->

[circleciL]:https://circleci.com/gh/negebauer/Siding
[circleciB]:https://circleci.com/gh/negebauer/Siding.svg?style=svg

[docsL]:http://inch-ci.org/github/negebauer/Siding
[docsB]:http://inch-ci.org/github/negebauer/Siding.svg?branch=master

[commitsL]:https://conventionalcommits.org
[commitsB]:https://img.shields.io/badge/commits-conventional-blue.svg

[standard-versionL]:https://github.com/conventional-changelog/standard-version
[standard-versionB]:https://img.shields.io/badge/version-standard-blue.svg
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "siding",
  "version": "0.1.2",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js start",
    "ios": "react-native run-ios",
    "android": "react-native run-android",
    "test": "jest",
    "lint": "eslint index.js src/",
    "release": "standard-version -a -m \"chore(release): %s\n\n[skip ci]\"",
    "build:increment": "react-native-version -b",
    "postrelease": "git push --follow-tags",
    "icon": "app-icon generate --icon assets/icon.png",
    "docs": "esdoc && git add docs && git commit -m \"chore(docs): update\n\n[skip ci]\""
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "autobind-decorator": "^2.1.0",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.1",
    "react": "16.3.1",
    "react-native": "0.55.2",
    "react-native-html-parser": "^0.0.5",
    "react-redux": "^5.0.7",
    "redux": "^4.0.0",
    "redux-logger": "^3.0.6",
    "redux-persist": "^5.9.1",
    "redux-promise-middleware": "^5.1.1",
    "redux-thunk": "^2.2.0",
    "reselect": "^3.0.1"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "app-icon": "^0.6.3",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.2.2",
    "babel-jest": "22.4.3",
    "babel-preset-react-native": "4.0.0",
    "babel-preset-react-native-stage-0": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb": "^16.1.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^2.9.0",
    "eslint-plugin-babel": "^5.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.11.0",
    "eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y": "^6.0.3",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^2.6.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.7.0",
    "jest": "22.4.3",
    "prettier": "^1.11.1",
    "react-native-version": "^2.5.0",
    "react-test-renderer": "16.3.1",
    "standard-version": "^4.3.0"
  },
  "jest": {
    "preset": "react-native"
  },
  "standard-version": {
    "scripts": {
      "postbump": "react-native-version -s $(($(git rev-list --count master) + 88)) && git add android ios"
    }
  }
}
name: package.json
